Original:
林口為數不多的餐酒館
平安夜當天用餐有小驚喜薑餅屋
薑餅屋裡面還有小紙條
免費抽中shot
老闆跟所有店員都非常親切、態度超好

📌調酒部分

莫斯科騾子有肉桂、八角味
Bartender說不喜歡的話可以事先跟他們說
但這杯完全不像過往喝的莫斯科騾子
並不是經典酒譜裡的配方

我本身不排斥肉桂八角味
但強烈肉桂跟八角味會蓋過薑汁味
同時似乎沒有喝到檸檬的酸味
個人認為檸檬的酸味可以和薑汁味達到平衡
呈現一種清爽的辛辣感
加入了八角和肉桂會讓我想到熱紅酒
就是非常濃烈的香料味
而非莫斯科騾子

同時一般莫斯科騾子在呈現上
會是略滿杯的碎冰（碎冰會稍超過杯緣）
可能我孤陋寡聞 😂
但我覺得這要呈現的視覺效果比較好
不然可惜了銅杯的外觀

國王谷
這杯就調和的不錯
威士忌基酒很厚
顏色也是引人入勝的綠色
（j個就是我要的效果啊～～）
平安夜來杯綠色系調酒再適合不過

📌餐點部分

提拉米蘇👍
推推推～
可能因為是餐酒館
提拉米蘇的蛋糕層濕潤且酒香濃厚
蛋糕頂層還有巧克力碎屑增加口感
不過我認為起司層可以再柔軟一點

鹹派
味道不錯、料很多、派皮脆👌
但我覺得內餡有點太濕潤
切下去會散開
應該可以提高馬鈴薯的比例

義大利麵
點了傲嬌牛、青醬蝦（忘記名字）
看評論大家都說傲嬌牛好吃
由於我不吃牛肉
男友說牛肉品質普通
而我嘗過麵體後覺得
醬汁太稠變得有點像中式炒麵
麵體有點過軟

而青醬蝦的義大利麵也是同樣醬汁過稠
奶香跟青醬香並不突出
花椒粒賦予了特色
但我覺得其實並不太搭
麵體中夾帶了生硬的洋蔥
真的有在吃中式炒麵的感覺 😂

總結：酒、甜點、小食可以
EN:
There are one of the few restaurants in Linkou
There is a small surprise gingerbread house on the day of Ping An Night
There are small note in the gingerbread house
Free to get shot for free
The boss and all the clerks are very kind and have a good attitude

📌 📌 📌 📌

Moscow mules have cinnamon and octagonal flavor
Bartender said that if you don't like it, you can tell them in advance
But this cup is not like the Moscow mule you used to drink in the past
Not the formula in the classic winemaking

I do not exclude the flavor of cinnamon
But strong cinnamon and octagonal flavor will cover the ginger flavor
At the same time, it doesn’t seem to drink the sour taste of the lemon
Personally think that the sour taste of lemon can be balanced with the smell of ginger juice
Show a refreshing spicy feeling
Add octagon and cinnamon will make me think of hot red wine
It's a very strong flavor
Not Moscow mule

At the same time, Moscow mules are presented
It will be a slightly cup of broken ice (broken ice will exceed the cup fate)
Maybe I'm ignorant 陋
But I think the visual effect to present is better
Otherwise, the appearance of the bronze cup

King
This cup is well reconciled
Whiskey base wine is thick
Color is also fascinating green
(J is the effect I want ~~)
Ping An Night Cup Cup of Green Mixing is suitable for bartending

📌 meal part

Tiramisu 苏
Push push ~
Maybe because it is a restaurant
Tiramisu's cake layer is moist and strong
The top layer of the cake also has chocolate debris to increase taste
But I think the cheese can be softened

Salty
Good taste, a lot of ingredients, crispy crispy
But I think the filling is a bit too humid
Cut it down and spread it out
It should be able to increase the proportion of potatoes

pasta
Ordered Aojiao beef, green sauce shrimp (forget the name)
See the comments, everyone said that Aojiao Niu is delicious
Because I don't eat beef
Boyfriend said that beef quality is ordinary
And I feel after I tasted the mask
The sauce is too thick and it becomes a bit like Chinese fried noodles
Monad is a bit soft

The pasta of green sauce shrimp is the same as the sauce too thick
Milk fragrance and green sauce are not prominent
Pepper pepper grain given characteristics
But I don't think it's really good
There is a stiff onion in the facade
I really feel like eating Chinese fried noodles 😂

Summary: wine, dessert, snacks can

｛尼格羅尼｝就比較普通了

次 Hot red wine 的 This time the hot red wine is a bit sour and stronger, but the sugar on the edge of the cup will be better

｝ Nigrini is more ordinary

🍃 Environment:
To be honest, the locomotive is really cool, and it is shocked at the door. Presumably the shopkeeper is a locomotive enthusiast ~

Original: 食物很好，海鮮拼盤很豐盛，但魷魚和大蝦還不錯。飲料很好
EN: The food is very good, the seafood platter is rich, but squid and prawns are pretty good.Good drink

Original:
美味的食物，優秀的員工和極好的氛圍。

每個味蕾都有多種選擇。強烈推薦。
EN:
Delicious food, excellent employees and excellent atmosphere.

Each taste buds have a variety of choices.Strongly recommended.

Original: 酒吧不僅啤酒的選擇很差，雞尾酒也貴得離譜，而且老闆還向我們收取了兩倍的飲料費。當要求央視複查時，損失方謊稱沒用。非常不誠實而且昂貴。逃離這個地方！
EN: Not only did the bars choose a poor choice, but the cocktail was also outrageous, and the boss also charged us twice the beverage fee.When CCTV was required to review it, the lied party lied that it was useless.Very dishonest and expensive.Escape from this place!

Original: 環境很好。起司義大利麵很好吃。配上真正的脆培根。他們有多種飲料和小吃可供選擇。
EN: The environment is very good.The cheese Italian noodles are delicious.With a real crispy bacon.They have a variety of beverages and snacks to choose from.
